TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UrlIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class UrlIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class UrlIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: 为代码的来源 URL 定义标识权限。

span.span: Defines the identity permission for the URL from which the code originates.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被视为完整的 URL，包括协议 （HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP） 和文件。The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file. 例如，http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm是完整的 URL。For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL. Url 可以匹配完全或通配符在最后一个位置，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*。URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*. Url 还可以包含通配符 ("\*") 在点分隔符的前缀。URLs can also contain a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，URL 名称字符串http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/是子集 http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ 和 http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/。For example, the URL name string http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ is a subset of http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ and http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不使用标识权限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，即使调用程序集是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，但如果程序集不符合要求的条件故障的标识权限的需求。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的要求是如果调用程序集具有完全信任关系无效。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 即，请求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 这可确保所有权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET framework 版本[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，可以使用方法，以防止对系统资源的意外访问受信任的代码。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 现已过时，并对资源的访问现在只能由授予的权限集的程序集来决定。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制访问文件，必须运行沙盒中部分受信任的代码，并将它分配给代码可以访问的资源的权限。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 有关在沙盒中运行的应用程序的信息，请参阅[如何： 运行部分受信任的代码在沙盒中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md). > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识的权限不能具有权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为与实现接口。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface.

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或者创建一个完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`权限。Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识的权限不能具有权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为与实现接口。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 即，请求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，即使调用程序集是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，但如果程序集不符合要求的条件故障的标识权限的需求。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的要求是如果调用程序集具有完全信任关系无效。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这可确保所有权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CPP/urlidentity.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CS/urlidentity.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/VB/urlidentity.vb#7)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，以表示 所描述的 URL 标识。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to represent the URL identity described by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被视为完整的 URL，包括协议 (HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP) 和文件，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/. Url 可以匹配完全或通配符在最后一个位置，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*。URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*. Url 还可以包含通配符 ("\*") 在点分隔符的前缀。URLs can also contain a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，URL 名称字符串http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/是子集 http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ 和 http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/。For example, the URL name string http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ is a subset of http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ and http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/. > [!NOTE] > 从.NET Framework 版本 2.0 中，出于性能原因，一个无效的 URL 不会导致创建新的类实例时出现参数异常。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, for performance reasons, an invalid URL does not cause an argument exception at the time the new class instance is created. 执行集合操作 （Union、 Intersect 或 IsSubsetOf） 之一时，将出现参数异常。The argument exception will occur when one of the set operations (Union, Intersect, or IsSubsetOf) is executed. 需按权限会导致调用的安全基础结构。A demand on the permission causes to be called by the security infrastructure. 请求将失败由于参数异常，从而导致所引发。The demand will fail because of the argument exception, resulting in a being thrown. 在此情况下，原始将不会看到异常。In this case, the original exception will not be seen. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CPP/urlidentity.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CS/urlidentity.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/VB/urlidentity.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述两者共同描述的 Url 的访问权限的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes access to the URLs they both describe in common. 只有传递两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 例如，交集的权限，表示访问http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm和表示访问权限http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\* 是一个权限，表示访问http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。For example, the intersection of a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm and a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\* is a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm. 支持集运算 (， ，和) 仅当当前权限与指定的权限的对象相等或权限之一时使用通配符运算符 ("\*")。 supports set operations (, , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission object or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("\*").

exception.span: 参数不为 ，并且与当前权限不属于同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

exception.span: 或

span.span: -or-

exception.span: 此 Url 属性不是有效的 URL。

span.span: The Url property is not a valid URL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限标识完全包含指定的权限的 URL 访问，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission identifies access to a URL that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，一个权限，表示权http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm是表示对访问权限的子集http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\*。For example, a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a subset of a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\*. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 支持集运算 (， ，和) 仅当当前权限是否等于指定的权限或权限之一时使用通配符运算符 ("\*")。 supports set operations (, , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("\*").

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果方法是表示对由当前的权限，表示 URL 的访问，以及对 URL 表示的指定权限的访问权限。The result of a call to the method is a permission that represents access to the URL as represented by the current permission, as well as access to the URL as represented by the specified permission. 类支持集运算， ，和) 仅当当前权限是否等于指定的权限或权限之一使用通配符运算符 ("\*") 和一个是的子集其他。The class supports set operations , , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission, or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("\*") and one is a subset of the other.

exception.span: 操作不明确，因为权限表示多个标识。

span.span: The operation is ambiguous because the permission represents multiple identities.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Url : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表示 Internet 代码的标识的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets a URL representing the identity of Internet code.

value.span: 表示 Internet 代码的标识的 URL。

span.span: A URL representing the identity of Internet code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被视为完整的 URL，包括协议 (HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP) 和文件，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/. Url 可以匹配完全或通配符在最后一个位置，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*。URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*.

exception.span: 无法检索 URL，因为它的标识不明确。

span.span: The URL cannot be retrieved because it has an ambiguous identity.
